title: Is it ok for organizations to take pictures of giving Zakat? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: and finally the organization that donates and gives donations and charity but they click photos of the people while receiving it this is humiliating to the poor this respecting them and it's not permissible if you want to advertise or to bring attention so that others would donate then you have to blur the faces of the poor people so that their dignity would not be touched
